document.masterDocTitle: Notes on the Dianous aereus complex with description of a new species (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae)

, Dai & Peng leg. ( SHNU )

Measurements. BL: 3.9–4.7 mm , FL: 2.4–2.7 mm . HW: 0.88–0.97 mm , PL: 0.74–0.80 mm , PW: 0.74–0.82 mm , EL: 1.11–1.23 mm , EW: 1.11–1.25 mm , SL: 0.96–1.06 mm . Head 0.74–0.80 times as wide as elytra, pronotum 0.95–1.00 times as long as wide, elytra 0.97–1.01 times as long as wide.
Distribution. China ( Yunnan , Guangxi , Hainan ), Vietnam , Laos .

Remarks. The species is similar to
D. rougemontianus Puthz, 2000
from Sichuan and Hubei ,
D. ruginosus Zheng, 1993
from Sichuan , and
D. aerator Puthz, 2016
widely distributed in China , but can be easily distinguished from them by body with blue metallic tinge and smaller ratio of HW/EW. The species is new to Guangxi .
